FuncDef:
The traffic-statistics enable command enables traffic statistics collection globally in the VSI view.
The undo traffic-statistics enable command disables traffic statistics collection globally in the VSI view.
By default, traffic statistics collection is not enabled globally in the VSI view.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable traffic statistics collection globally for a VSI, run the traffic-statistics enable command.
Precautions
The traffic-statistics enable (VSI view) and traffic-statistics enable (VSI-LDP view) commands are mutually exclusive.
